body: @zombieadd Doesn't shock me, Fujiko's been writing Yuki as incredibly bi-polar for a long while now. Kinda hope Shoma throws it in her face since she made her choice already, but I doubt that happens.
@NERDS: Seriously? What right does she have to be jelly at new girl while being fucked thoroughly by douche Coach, HMM???? Such a rage-inducing moment there just by knowing it...
I saw a sample of chapter 22 and the stinking bitch is actually jealous of the new girl.
